title: Cakes in Space
description: Astra and her family are travelling through space to a new home on Nova Mundi, when their space ship is attacked!Killer cupcakes, batty battenbergs, and marauding muffins - cakey fiends are on the loose! It's up to Astra and her robot friend, Pilbeam, to stop them before they destroy her ship... After all, people should eat cakes, not the other way round...
author: Philip Reeve
